input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item keywords and item name.

Item name:
Valterra D04-0054 EZ Flush Silver 20' Triple Wrap Drain Hose

Item keywords:
Maximum leak protection
40% more vinyl and wire than heavy-duty hoses
Extra heavy-duty 0.054 diameter wire can withstand more abuse from accidental crushing
30 coils per foot creates the smoothest interior for complete waste removal
Use for full-time and semi-permanent RVing

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Hi there! Do you need a super special hose for your RV? Look no further! Our Valterra D04-0054 EZ Flush Silver 20' Triple Wrap Drain Hose is the bestest! It's got lots of extra vinyl and wire to protect against leaks and can handle all kinds of abuse. It's extra thick and has lots of coils to make sure all the yucky stuff comes out. It's perfect for full-time and semi-permanent RVing. You'll love it!
input_text.Response B: The Valterra D04-0054 EZ Flush Silver 20' Triple Wrap Drain Hose is a hose that is used to connect your RV to the sewer. The hose is made of extra heavy-duty wire that can withstand more abuse from accidental crushing. The hose has a smooth interior that helps to prevent clogs and ensures complete waste removal. The Valterra D04-0054 EZ Flush Silver 20' Triple Wrap Drain Hose is perfect for full-time and semi-permanent RVing.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
